trans-unit.source: Install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

seg-source.mrk: Install <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

target.mrk: Installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be installed on one of the supported OS, using the dedicated setup provided.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be installed on one of the supported OS, using the dedicated setup provided.

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> doit être installé sur l'un des systèmes d'exploitation pris en charge, à l'aide de la configuration dédiée fournie.

trans-unit.source: For the latest list of supported servers, see the Compatibility Guide.

seg-source.mrk: For the latest list of supported servers, see the Compatibility Guide.

target.mrk: Pour connaître la liste des systèmes d’exploitation pris en charge, consultez le Guide de compatibilité .

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, Atempo strongly recommends that you do not install the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" style="font-weight: normal;" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server on the same machine.

seg-source.mrk: For performance reasons, Atempo strongly recommends that you do not install the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" style="font-weight: normal;" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server on the same machine.

target.mrk: Pour des raisons de performance, Atempo vous déconseille fortement d'installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et le Serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" style="font-weight: normal;" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur la même machine.

trans-unit.source: If you must manage snapshots of your HyperStream environment, Atempo strongly recommends that you do not install the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a disk containing a paging file.

seg-source.mrk: If you must manage snapshots of your HyperStream environment, Atempo strongly recommends that you do not install the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a disk containing a paging file.

target.mrk: Si vous devez gérer des snapshots de votre environnement HyperStream, Atempo vous recommande fortement de ne pas installer le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur un disque contenant un fichier d'échange.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites

target.mrk: Prérequis

trans-unit.source: You should use only direct attached storage or SAN to locate the repository. Mainly for performance issues, Atempo recommends to avoid NFS/CIFS mount points.

seg-source.mrk: You should use only direct attached storage or SAN to locate the repository.
Mainly for performance issues, Atempo recommends to avoid NFS/CIFS mount points.

target.mrk: Vous ne devez utiliser que le stockage à connexion directe ou le SAN pour localiser l'espace de stockage.
Principalement pour des problèmes de performance, Atempo recommande d'éviter les points de montage NFS/CIFS.

trans-unit.source: Check the following prerequisites to <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> installation (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_prereq_install" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Vérifiez les prérequis suivants pour l'installation du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (<MadCap:xref href="#hss_prereq_install" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Hardware and Processor

target.mrk: Matériel et processeur

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server must be installed:

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server must be installed:

target.mrk: Vous devez installer le serveur <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: On a machine with a multi-core 64-bit processor.

seg-source.mrk: On a machine with a multi-core 64-bit processor.

target.mrk: Sur une machine dotée d’un processeur 64 bits multicœur.

trans-unit.source: On a local, dedicated fast access disk such as an SSD.

seg-source.mrk: On a local, dedicated fast access disk such as an SSD.

target.mrk: Sur un disque d’accès rapide local et dédié, tel qu’un SSD.

trans-unit.source: Memory

seg-source.mrk: Memory

target.mrk: Mémoire

trans-unit.source: At least 8 GB of RAM is required.

seg-source.mrk: At least 8 GB of RAM is required.

target.mrk: Un minimum de 8 Go de RAM est nécessaire.

trans-unit.source: Block File Repository

seg-source.mrk: Block File Repository

target.mrk: Espace de stockage de fichiers de bloc

trans-unit.source: At least 32 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the unique <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data blocks are stored.

seg-source.mrk: At least 32 GB of disk space must be permanently available on the volume where the unique <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> data blocks are stored.

target.mrk: Un minimum de 32 Go d'espace disque doit être disponible en permanence sur le volume où sont stockés les blocs de données uniques d'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> .

trans-unit.source: Linux Server

seg-source.mrk: Linux Server

target.mrk: Serveur Linux

trans-unit.source: X windows is required to launch the setup. It is recommended to avoid using a Windows X server.

seg-source.mrk: X windows is required to launch the setup.
It is recommended to avoid using a Windows X server.

target.mrk: X windows est nécessaire au lancement de l’installation.
Il est recommandé de ne pas utiliser un serveur X sur Windows.

trans-unit.source: Linux Server Snapshot

seg-source.mrk: Linux Server Snapshot

target.mrk: Snapshot du serveur Windows

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Linux Server, all your ADE components must be stored on:

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Linux Server, all your ADE components must be stored on:

target.mrk: Si vous avez l’intention d’utiliser des snapshots pour sécuriser votre serveur Linux, stockez tous vos composants ADE sur :

trans-unit.source: Version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2.

seg-source.mrk: Version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2.

target.mrk: La version 2.02.95 ou supérieure de LVM2.

trans-unit.source: Thinly-Provisioned Logical Volumes (thin volumes).

seg-source.mrk: Thinly-Provisioned Logical Volumes (thin volumes).

target.mrk: Des volumes logiques à allocation fine (thin volume).

trans-unit.source: See <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm#hss_appendix_thin_volume_3890073035_1080522" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: See <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm#hss_appendix_thin_volume_3890073035_1080522" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Voir <MadCap:xref href="../Documentation_Lina/Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm#hss_appendix_thin_volume_3890073035_1080522" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Windows Server Snapshot

seg-source.mrk: Windows Server Snapshot

target.mrk: Snapshot du serveur Windows

trans-unit.source: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Windows Server, all your ADE components must be stored on an NTFS filesystem.

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to use snapshots to secure your Windows Server, all your ADE components must be stored on an NTFS filesystem.

target.mrk: Si vous avez l’intention d’utiliser des snapshots pour sécuriser votre serveur Windows, stockez tous vos composants ADE sur un système de fichiers NTFS.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if you want to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, if you want to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

target.mrk: De plus, si vous voulez utiliser la fonctionnalité snapshot revert, n’installez aucun composant ADE sur le disque système.

trans-unit.source: Filesystem

seg-source.mrk: Filesystem

target.mrk: Système de fichiers

trans-unit.source: Atempo recommends using an ext4 filesystem on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

seg-source.mrk: Atempo recommends using an ext4 filesystem on Linux servers and NTFS on Windows servers.

seg-source.mrk: Communication Ports

target.mrk: Ports de communication

trans-unit.source: These ports must be open on your firewall:

seg-source.mrk: These ports must be open on your firewall:

target.mrk: Vous devez ouvrir ces ports dans votre pare-feu :

trans-unit.source: 8181 Communication port for .

seg-source.mrk: 8181 Communication port for .

target.mrk: 8181 Port de communication de la .

trans-unit.source: 23232 Communication port for . Open this port in input, or in input/output if there is a replication destination.

seg-source.mrk: 23232 Communication port for .
Open this port in input, or in input/output if there is a replication destination.

target.mrk: 23232 Port de communication d'.
Ouvrez ce port en entrée, ou en entrée/sortie si vous disposez d’une destination de réplication.

trans-unit.source: Web browser proxy

seg-source.mrk: Web browser proxy

target.mrk: Proxy du navigateur web

trans-unit.source: If your web browser uses a proxy, ensure that the network used by the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is included in the exclusion list of the browser proxy. Otherwise you may get this security error when you try to access your server in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> : "Attempt to load data from a server outside the security sandbox".

seg-source.mrk: If your web browser uses a proxy, ensure that the network used by the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is included in the exclusion list of the browser proxy.

Otherwise you may get this security error when you try to access your server in the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> : "Attempt to load data from a server outside the security sandbox".

target.mrk: Si votre navigateur Web utilise un proxy, assurez-vous que le réseau utilisé par le <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est inclus dans la liste d'exclusion du proxy du navigateur.

Sinon, vous risquez de recevoir cette erreur de sécurité lorsque vous essayez d'accéder à votre serveur dans la <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> : «Tentative de chargement de données à partir d'un serveur en dehors du sandbox de sécurité».

trans-unit.source: User

seg-source.mrk: User

target.mrk: Utilisateur

trans-unit.source: The user launching the setup program must have administrator/root rights.

seg-source.mrk: The user launching the setup program must have administrator/root rights.

target.mrk: L’utilisateur qui lance le programme d’installation doit avoir des droits d’administrateur ou root.

trans-unit.source: Product Download

seg-source.mrk: Product Download

target.mrk: Téléchargement Produit

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have downloaded the binaries from Atempo Client Portal: https://support.atempo.com.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure you have downloaded the binaries from Atempo Client Portal: https://support.atempo.com.

target.mrk: Assurez-vous d'avoir téléchargé les binaires à partir du portail client Atempo : https://support.atempo.com .

trans-unit.source: During the installation or upgrade, the setup verifies that prerequisites are met. If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, you either get a warning informing you that such requirement is not met and what our recommendations are, or the installation stops until you make the necessary changes to meet the prerequisites.

seg-source.mrk: During the installation or upgrade, the setup verifies that prerequisites are met.

If your environment does not meet some of the prerequisites, you either get a warning informing you that such requirement is not met and what our recommendations are, or the installation stops until you make the necessary changes to meet the prerequisites.

target.mrk: Lors de l’installation ou la mise à jour, le programme d’installation vérifie si les conditions préalables sont remplies.

Si certaines ne le sont pas, soit vous recevrez un avertissement vous informant des conditions non remplies ainsi que nos recommandations, soit l’installation s’arrêtera pour vous permettre d’effectuer les modifications nécessaires.

trans-unit.source: Installation

seg-source.mrk: Installation

target.mrk: Installation

trans-unit.source: Atempo recommends to install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a physical machine rather than a virtual one.

seg-source.mrk: Atempo recommends to install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on a physical machine rather than a virtual one.

target.mrk: Atempo vous recommande d’effectuer l'installation du <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur une machine physique plutôt que sur une machine virtuelle.

trans-unit.source: Launch the setup program corresponding to your operating system:

seg-source.mrk: Launch the setup program corresponding to your operating system:

target.mrk: Lancez le programme d’installation correspondant à votre système d'exploitation.

trans-unit.source: Windows.

seg-source.mrk: Windows.

target.mrk: Windows.

trans-unit.source: Double click ATSXXX-Windows-X64.exe.

seg-source.mrk: Double click ATSXXX-Windows-X64.exe.

target.mrk: Double-cliquez sur ATSXXX-Windows-X64.exe.

trans-unit.source: Linux.

seg-source.mrk: Linux.

target.mrk: Linux.

trans-unit.source: Run ATSXXX-Linux-X64.bin.

seg-source.mrk: Run ATSXXX-Linux-X64.bin.

target.mrk: Exécutez ATSXXX-Linux-X64.bin.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the binary is executable. If needed, set the permission with the command: chmod +x.

seg-source.mrk: Make sure that the binary is executable.
If needed, set the permission with the command: chmod +x.

target.mrk: Assurez-vous que le binaire puisse être exécuté.
Si nécessaire, définissez les permissions avec la commande : chmod +x.

trans-unit.source: Select the installation language, then click OK..

seg-source.mrk: Select the installation language, then click OK..

target.mrk: Sélectionnez la langue d'installation, puis cliquez sur OK.

trans-unit.source: If you are launching the setup on a Linux platform, through a Windows platform using a remote display, you may not be able to change the installation language. This is due to an X server issue.

seg-source.mrk: If you are launching the setup on a Linux platform, through a Windows platform using a remote display, you may not be able to change the installation language.
This is due to an X server issue.

target.mrk: Si vous lancez le programme d'installation sur une plate-forme Linux, via une plate-forme Windows utilisant un affichage distant, vous ne pourrez peut-être pas la langue d'installation.
Ceci est dû à un problème de serveur X.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Accept the license agreement, then click Next. The HSS Server is included by default in the setup program.

seg-source.mrk: Accept the license agreement, then click Next.
The HSS Server is included by default in the setup program.

target.mrk: Acceptez le Contrat de licence, puis cliquez sur Suivant.
Le serveur HSS est inclus par défaut dans le programme d'installation.

trans-unit.source: In the Parameters pane, select Installation, then click Next.

seg-source.mrk: In the Parameters pane, select Installation, then click Next.

target.mrk: Dans le panneau Paramètres, sélectionnez Installation, puis cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Select:

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Select:

target.mrk: (Facultatif) Sélectionnez :

trans-unit.source: The main destination directory for the . The default destination directory is C:\Program Files\Atempo .

seg-source.mrk: The main destination directory for the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
The default destination directory is C:\Program Files\Atempo .

target.mrk: Le répertoire de destination principal pour l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Le répertoire de destination par défaut est : C:\Program Files\Atempo.

trans-unit.source: If needed, select Choose and browse the directory tree to select an installation directory other than the default (C:\Program Files\Atempo).

seg-source.mrk: If needed, select Choose and browse the directory tree to select an installation directory other than the default (C:\Program Files\Atempo).

target.mrk: Si nécessaire, sélectionnez Répertoire d'installation et parcourez l'arborescence des répertoires pour sélectionner un répertoire d'installation autre que celui par défaut (C:\Program Files\Atempo).

trans-unit.source: To return to the default directory, click Restore Default. It is recommended to install on a physical machine rather than a virtual one.

seg-source.mrk: To return to the default directory, click Restore Default.
It is recommended to install on a physical machine rather than a virtual one.

target.mrk: Pour revenir au répertoire par défaut, cliquez sur Restaurer le dossier par défaut.
Il est recommandé de l'installer sur une machine physique plutôt que sur une machine virtuelle.

trans-unit.source: The advanced setup option. This option defines a customized service name. By default, the home directory is C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default. The HyperStream home directory is composed of the installation directory selected in the previous window, and of the service name. The structure of the directory path is: \AtempoDedupEngine\.

seg-source.mrk: The advanced setup option.
This option defines a customized service name.
By default, the home directory is C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default.
The HyperStream home directory is composed of the installation directory selected in the previous window, and of the service name.
The structure of the directory path is: \AtempoDedupEngine\.

target.mrk: L'option de configuration avancée.
Cette option définit un nom de service personnalisé.
Par défaut, le répertoire d'accueil est C:\Program Files\Atempo\AtempoDedupEngine\default.
Le répertoire d'accueil HyperStream est composé du répertoire d'installation sélectionné dans la fenêtre précédente, ainsi que du nom du service.
Le format du chemin du répertoire est : \AtempoDedupEngine\.

trans-unit.source: To modify the default service name, select this option, enter a service name, then click Next.

seg-source.mrk: To modify the default service name, select this option, enter a service name, then click Next.

target.mrk: Pour modifier le nom de service par défaut, sélectionnez cette option, entrez un nom de service, puis cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.

seg-source.mrk: Click Next.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Suivant.

trans-unit.source: Click Install.

seg-source.mrk: Click Install.

target.mrk: Cliquez sur Installer.

trans-unit.source: If needed, define a port number other than the default 8181 port for the console.

seg-source.mrk: If needed, define a port number other than the default 8181 port for the console.

target.mrk: Si nécessaire, définissez un numéro de port autre que le port 8181 par défaut pour la console .

trans-unit.source: When installation is finished, the Atempo Dedup Engine service starts automatically. To check that it is running:

seg-source.mrk: When installation is finished, the Atempo Dedup Engine service starts automatically.
To check that it is running:

target.mrk: Une fois l’installation terminée, le servicee Atempo Dedup Engine démarre automatiquement.
Pour vérifier l’état du service :

trans-unit.source: Windows Select Start > Administration Tools > Services.

seg-source.mrk: Windows Select Start > Administration Tools > Services.

target.mrk: Windows Sélectionnez Démarrer > Outils d'administration > Services.

trans-unit.source: Linux Launch the/etc/init.d/ADE.default status command.

seg-source.mrk: Linux Launch the/etc/init.d/ADE.default status command.

target.mrk: Linux Lancer la commande /etc/init.d/ADE.default status.

trans-unit.source: If you intend to perform ongoing mirroring or replication of your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, which Atempo strongly recommends, you must install a second server on a separate machine with the same installation parameters as your main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: If you intend to perform ongoing mirroring or replication of your <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, which Atempo strongly recommends, you must install a second server on a separate machine with the same installation parameters as your main <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Si vous envisagez d'effectuer une copie miroir en continu ou bien répliquer votre <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, ce qu' Atempo recommande fortement, vous devez installer un second serveur sur une machine différente avec les mêmes paramètres d’installation que ceux du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> principal.
